content: this is a free and super easy pattern to make an adorable tiny dumbo octopus plushie materials needed worsted weight yarn i used big twist value in baby pink 3 75mm hook i like this hook by tulip etimo safety eyes i used 6mm fiber fill stitch markers yarn needle scissors abbreviations magic_ring- magic_ring st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet increase- increase slip_stitch- slip_stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet decrease- decrease flo- front loops only fo- finish off/fasten_off
